title: Prima flour price up by Rs. 40 from today
body_lines: The price of a kilogram of wheat flour sold by the Prima Ceylon Ltd has been increased by Rs. 40 from today, the company said.
They said the price was increased due to the rupee depreciating against US dollar.
Earlier, the company had increased the price of one kilogram of wheat flour by Rs. 42 on April 19. (Chaturanga Samarawickrama)
